original_text: When the officers have finished speaking to the army, they shall appoint commanders over it.
korean_text: 백성에게 이르기를 마친 후에 군대의 지휘관들을 세워 무리를 거느리게 할지니라

sentences.original_text: When the officers have finished speaking to the army
they shall appoint commanders over it
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 위에 지휘관들을 임명할 것이다
